review: Liked how easy it was to set up.  bought as a gift and didn't like the fact it was automatically set up attached to my account.  I got it for the wife so it wasn't a problem, but as a gift it would be.
author: James Dennis

review: Love it. Easily installed and a wonderful addition to our media options.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy set up. Great streaming. Less than 1/2 cost of Apple TV. Will buy more of them.

review: Easy to install and use. Exactly what we needed!
author: Jennifer Merino

review: My tv is apparently older than your target customer, so we had some trouble getting it set up, but it is working now.

review: I love my fire stick. I've if the best things I've ever bought. :-)

review: Awesome.  Love how easy and affordable it is.

review: Absolutely love my amazon fire stick!  It is very user friendly.  I can take it with me from room to room and when I travel.  Thanks Drew, what a great gift!!
